name: Medicare.gov
description: Official federal government website managed by the U.S. Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS) that provides comprehensive information about Medicare benefits, coverage, and services. Offers tools to find and compare health and drug plans, locate care providers, manage Medicare accounts, and access educational resources about Medicare benefits and enrollment.
source: Verified from official federal government website
hours_of_operation: 24 hours a day, 7 days a week (except some federal holidays)
notes: Federal government website providing official Medicare information and services. Available 24/7 with live chat and phone support. TTY users can call 1-877-486-2048. Managed by the Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services (CMS).
